video.title: Nazi Mega Weapons
video.synopsis: This documentary series examines Nazi Germany's military hardware, defenses and technology, including fortifications, U-boats and ballistic missiles.

episodes.synopsis: Fearing Allied invasion of occupied Europe, Hitler ordered a massive defensive wall built, from France in the south to Norway in the north.
episodes.title: Atlantic Wall

episodes.synopsis: To protect their infamous U-boats in port, the Nazis built concrete pens so strong they were able to withstand Allied bombs -- and still stand today.
episodes.title: U-Boat Base

episodes.synopsis: The pioneering work of Nazi scientist Wernher von Braun heralded the creation of the ballistic missile and paved the way for the space race.
episodes.title: V2 Rocket

episodes.synopsis: Not satisfied with having the world's largest tank at 180 tons, Hitler ordered the construction of a 1,000-ton super tank, sparking an arms race.
episodes.title: Super Tanks

episodes.synopsis: Explore the Nazis' Messerschmitt Me262, the most technologically advanced plane of Word War II, and the underground bat cave where it was built.
episodes.title: Jet Fighter Me262

episodes.synopsis: Explore the "Führerbunker," Hitler's underground Berlin fortress with four-meter thick concrete walls and surrounded by kill zones and strong points.
episodes.title: Fortress Berlin

episodes.synopsis: After Allied forces bomb German cities, Hitler strikes back by developing a radical weapon that gives rise to a missile that forever changes warfare.
episodes.title: Hitler's Vengeance Missile

episodes.synopsis: As Europe's nations succumb to the Nazis, a smug Hitler plans to invade Russia and orders the building of a massive concrete-fortified headquarters.
episodes.title: The Wolf's Lair

episodes.synopsis: The SS starts as a group of bodyguards and evolves into a cult of terror, envisioning a superior Aryan race and designing camps built for mass murder.
episodes.title: The SS

episodes.synopsis: As Hitler ascends to power, he tries to bolster his navy, but when his short-sighted plan falters, he uses two obsolete battleships for propaganda.
episodes.title: Hitler's Megaships

episodes.synopsis: In 1938, Germany begins building a massive defensive structure along its French border, complete with minefields, tank traps and weapon emplacements.
episodes.title: The Siegfried Line

episodes.synopsis: Recently found caves and secret hideouts in Japan reveal horrifying weapons and suicidal plans conceived in desperation to thwart American invasion.
episodes.title: Kamikaze
